Streamlabs OBS has detected dropped fra: Streamlabs OBS a détecté des images perdues
Some frames have not been uploaded. Thi: Certaines images n'ont pas été uploadées. Ce problème est généralement lié à une mauvaise connexion réseau.
Check the health of your Internet connec: Vérifiez la santé de votre connexion Internet
If none of these worked, lower your bitr: Si aucun d'entre eux n'a fonctionné, réduisez votre débit
Streamlabs OBS has detected skipped fram: Streamlabs OBS a détecté des images ignorées
Certaines images n'ont pas été encodées.
This problem is usually due to high CPU: Ce problème est généralement dû à une utilisation élevée du processeur ou à des paramètres d'encodeur inappropriés.
Lower your encoder settings (preset): Baissez les paramètres de votre encodeur (préréglage)
Ensure that you don't have any other app: Ensure that you don't have any other applications open that are heavy on your CPU
Enable performance mode in the Editor co: Enable performance mode in the Editor context menu
Streamlabs OBS has detected lagged frame: Streamlabs OBS has detected lagged frames
Some frames took too long to get rendere: Some frames took too long to get rendered.
Usually the problem is related to your g: Usually the problem is related to your game using up too many GPU resources.
When this happens, Streamlabs OBS does n: When this happens, Streamlabs OBS does not have any resources left over to render frames.
Disable FreeSync or GSync in your Driver: Disable FreeSync or GSync in your Driver
Lower graphics settings until you stop l: Lower graphics settings until you stop lagging frames
Disable hardware decoding under any medi: Disable hardware decoding under any media sources(This will slightly increase cpu over gpu)
